/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with advertisements and billboards, adding a vibrant splash of color to the otherwise monochrome cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
